entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Published size regression: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #56140
  • Published size regression: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #56139
  • Perf regression: json_middleware, plaintext, single_query #56138
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, json_middleware #56137
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes #56136
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes, fortunes_dapper #56135
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, single_query #56134
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #56130
  • Perf improvement: json, json #56129

Closed

  • Change in behavior for controller parameters or httpClient.PutAsJsonAsync after .NET6 (.NET 7 and .NET 8) #56141
  • Perf regression: caching, fortunes, plainTextEmptyFilter #56113
  • Perf regression: json_middleware, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter, updates #56090

PullRequests

Created

  • text fix: 'There' -> 'their' plus minor tweaks #56132
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Improve E2E tests performance #56127
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Add support for OpenAPI schema transformers #56093
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0-preview6
  • Update Components build and E2E testing instructions #56106
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview6

Updated

  • Allowing for the content type/encoding to be specified for the main Result types #55888
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fixed LDAP nested group claims #55707
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-security
  • [release/2.1] (deps): Bump modules/EntityFrameworkCore from `74055e1` to `268817f` #56008
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 2.1.x
  • Don't require latest runtime patch for Blazor DevServer #56123
    area-infrastructure
  • Log whether the localization resource is found or not #55897
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-ui-rendering
  • Add hidden input for easier binding in static edit forms #55989
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun
